class.name: MediaPipeClassifications
class.description: A MediaPipe task data container for classification results for a given classifier head.

method.name: has_head_name
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the classifications has [member head_name].

method.name: make_vector_proto_packet
method.description: Creates a [MediaPipePacket] that contains a vector of [code]mediapipe::ClassificationList[/code]s.

members.member: The index of the classifier head.
The optional name of the classifier head.
